attributes.action: Football Premier League to cancel the league for this season due to COVID-19.
attributes.background: I want the Government & Parliament to take a firm stand against the Premier League to cancel the league this season as its more about the health of the nation rather than raking in the millions. These millions will be well spent in curbing the spread.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of the Football Association.
